Action.author: binhn
Action.body: I changed to Story and linked it to Epic fab-37 as we should not create any more epics for 1.0. This is for tracking the workload by epics.

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: Let's update the status of this.

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: I'm not sure who is still using this. This is implemented at the orderer side, but I suspect there is still significant work to do on the peer side.

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: Discussed this with Binh, we're good to close this.
